2.0.0-alpha.1.name: node-fetch
2.0.0-alpha.1.description: A light-weight module that brings window.fetch to node.js

scripts.report: cross-env BABEL_ENV=coverage nyc --reporter lcov --reporter text mocha -R spec test/test.js
scripts.coverage: cross-env BABEL_ENV=coverage nyc --reporter json --reporter text mocha -R spec test/test.js && codecov -f coverage/coverage-final.json
